name: places/ChIJxYtDoItYwokRD_y5juBmhU4
formattedAddress: 67 W 71st St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 67 W 71st St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
I’ve been a HeyDay member for 5 years now, & have always had Hanna M. as my skin therapist. Even when she changed locations. That’s how LOYAL I am to her, she truly makes love to my face. Ask all her loyal clients throughout the years, she’s super knowledgeable, very funny, friendly, will be your skin therapist, but could also be your actual therapist!

Knowing Hanna for 5 years, I adore her & would recommend EVERYONE to go to her!!! My skin is beautiful I get compliments every single day

originalText.text: I went for a routine facial and this is my first time at Heyday. The shop was clean and the ambiance was calming. I was warmly greeted at reception and then Drew Jones came out to greet me and tell me she was prepping the room (I was early). I was offered water, and access to the WC the brief moment I waited. Drew is friendly, talented, and honestly so funny. When I left my skin was glowin’. Drew was gentle even when doing extractions - I barely felt a pinch. She was knowledgeable about skincare and taught me a few things to consider, while caring for my skin. I highly recommend their services and considering a membership, I’ll be back for my follow up.

originalText.text: Erin O at Heyday on 71st Street is a wonder! She listens to you, meets your needs and does magic. My dry skin is so much improved since I’ve started regular facials with her. I so look forward to my monthly visits.

text.text: Erin O at Heyday on 71st Street is a wonder! She listens to you, meets your needs and does magic. My dry skin is so much improved since I’ve started regular facials with her. I so look forward to my monthly visits.

originalText.text: Let me first say good skin is tied to good mental health! This is a reprieve from the city for my skin and my soul. My skin has come a long way since I started with Heyday UWS. Every esthetician is an expert and wonderful at what they do. While I do have a favorite with Samantha E., I know will be well taken care of as everyone is great. The times are convenient to busy schedules with evening appointments. The company core values shows with the diversity of staff, the education they provide clients and the products they curate. There is no pressure to buy from there and they meet you where you are with your lifestyle, budget and skin care routine with no judgement. I highly recommend over much pricer spas that often only see you once and load you up on products you don't need. Heyday sees it through and adjusts as your skin needs adjust.

originalText.text: I had the most incredible experience with getting a facial by Drew. From the moment I stepped into the spa, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. Drew's expertise and skill were evident throughout the entire session. Not only did she have an in-depth understanding of skincare, but her personalized approach truly set him apart. Drew's attention to detail, soothing demeanor, and product knowledge made it an unforgettable session. I can't wait to book another appointment with here to experience her exceptional services again!
